channel.title: ghostchatter's Podcast
channel.description: Ghost Chatter is part of the Texas Paranormal Research Family. Our show airs live every Wednesday at 8:00 PM EST by logging on to www.para-x.com then click on the live chat link.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: Jimmy Morris
channel.itunes:summary: Ghost Chatter is part of the Texas Paranormal Research Family. Our show airs live every Wednesday at 8:00 PM EST by logging on to www.para-x.com then click on the live chat link.

item.title: Jimmy Morris and Ladean Snodgrass EVP Night Special Edition
item.description: Join Ghost Chatter Host Jimmy Morris and Ladean Snodgrass, host of Metaphysically Speaking as they air their first show in a series about EVP's. Be sure to tune in to this amazing show the last Friday of every month at 7PM EST at www.para-x.com
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris
item.itunes:summary: Join Ghost Chatter Host Jimmy Morris and Ladean Snodgrass, host of Metaphysically Speaking as they air their first show in a series about EVP's. Be sure to tune in to this amazing show the last Friday of every month at 7PM EST at www.para-x.com

item.title: Ghost Chatter presents Joseph Donlan
item.description: Tn this episode of Ghost Chatter, host Jimmy Morris interviews Joe Donlan, author of the book series Ordaining Reality and host of a talk radio show called Ordaining Reality that delves into the world of the metaphysical realm. Listen in as they talk about his book and how his views meld with the work of the paranormal. Ghost Chatter Radio is professionally managed by Choice Treasures Entertainment and Ideal Event Management
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Ghost Chatter presents Patricia McLaine
item.description: In this episode of Ghost Chatter, host Jimmy Morris interviews Internationally recognized psychic Patricia McLaine. Often refered to as the psychic of the rich and famous, she has given over 40,000 readings in over a 40 year span. Listen in as we discuss how she got started in this field and the many celebrities she has given readings for as well as some mini readings.
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris

item.title: Ghost Chatter EVP Show
item.description: In this episode of Ghost Chatter, host Jimmy Morris goes over EVP (Electronic Voice Phonemona) files his team obtained across the country. Dont miss this great episode.
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of Ghost Chatter, host Jimmy Morris goes over EVP (Electronic Voice Phonemona) files his team obtained across the country. Dont miss this great episode.

item.title: Ghost Chatter presents Para Tom
item.description: In this episode of Ghost Chatter your host Jimmy Morris interviews Tom Lynch aka Para Tom. Listen as he talks about his experiences growing up and the direction he is taking with his paranormal research group.
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of Ghost Chatter your host Jimmy Morris interviews Tom Lynch aka Para Tom. Listen as he talks about his experiences growing up and the direction he is taking with his paranormal research group.

item.title: Ghost Chatter presents Elizabeth Watson "Ghost Whisperer"
item.description: Tune in as your host Jimmy Morris interviews the "Ghost Whisperer" from Canada. Learn how she uses her abilities to help others and how she melds technology with her natural abilities. A dont wanna miss episode.
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris
item.itunes:summary: Tune in as your host Jimmy Morris interviews the "Ghost Whisperer" from Canada. Learn how she uses her abilities to help others and how she melds technology with her natural abilities. A dont wanna miss episode.

item.title: Ghost Chatter presents Noah Leigh of Paranormal Investigators of Miluwaukee
item.description: Jimmy Morris, host of Ghost Chatter, is joined by the founder of Paranormal Investigators of Miluwaukee, Noah Leigh. In this episode they talk about how he got started in the paranormal as well as investigation techniques used by Noah and his team. Don't miss this great episode. You can listen live every Wednesday night at 8pm EST at www.para-x.com/live.html

item.title: Ghost Chatter presents Sophie Reicher
item.description: Join Ghost Chatter host Jimmy Morris, as he interviews Sophie Reicher, author of Spiritual Protection. Listen in as they discuss issues of paranormal and spiritual protection as well as past paranormal experiences. Find out where to get the great book every ghost hunter needs.
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris
item.itunes:summary: Join Ghost Chatter host Jimmy Morris, as he interviews Sophie Reicher, author of Spiritual Protection. Listen in as they discuss issues of paranormal and spiritual protection as well as past paranormal experiences. Find out where to get the great book every ghost hunter needs.

item.title: Ghost Chatter All About Ghosts part 4
item.description: Welcome to the 4th and final chapter of the All About Ghost series. In this episode we talk about team and case management. Learn the do's and don'ts of dealing with clients and starting your own paranormal team.
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the 4th and final chapter of the All About Ghost series. In this episode we talk about team and case management. Learn the do's and don'ts of dealing with clients and starting your own paranormal team.

item.title: Ghost Chatter All About Ghosts Part 3
item.description: Welcome to part 3 in the 4 part series "All About Ghosts". In this episode we talk about use of typical and advanced paranormal equipment.
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to part 3 in the 4 part series "All About Ghosts". In this episode we talk about use of typical and advanced paranormal equipment.

item.title: Ghost Chatter presents Paranormal 101 part 2
item.description: In part two of the paranormal 101 series listen as Jimmy Morris discusses Investigation Techniques. You will learn more about types of ghosts, types of hauntings, how to deal with paranormal situations and more. Dont miss this 2nd part of the 4 part paranormal 101 series.
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris

item.title: Ghost Chatter and Paranormal 101
item.description: IN this first part of a 4 part series on the basics of ghost hunting, your host JImmy Morris takes you back to the basics of paranormal investigating. Listen to todays segment which is...What are ghosts? Be sure to catch the next 3 amazing episodes in this series.
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Morris

item.title: Ghost Chatter presents Helping Ghosts
item.description: In this episode, host Jimmy Morris interviews Louis Charles, author of the book Helping Ghosts. Listen in as they discuss this awesome book along with the reasons the author had behind writing it. You will learn about EVP's and the new RTSC devices called Ghost Boxes. Don't miss this great episode.

item.title: Ghost Chatter Radio
item.description: Listen in to Ghost Chatter Radio with your host Jimmy Morris and he discusses all things spooky and paranormal. Catch Ghost Chatter live every Wednesday at 8:00 PM EST at www.para-x.com/live.html
